Question: The 1967–68 break in touring allowed this person to focus on open tunings, which are commonly used for slide guitar.
Hints: Recordings of this person playing other instruments besides guitar are not unusual.
In his solo career, this person has often shared co-writing credits with drummer and co-producer Steve Jordan.
During the 2006 and 2007 Rolling Stones' tours this person sang "You Got the Silver" (1969) without self-accompaniment.
